title: Sony unveils the open style Link Buds with Google Assistant, Fast Pair, and skin touch controls
content:
There are a lot of users out there who don’t mind setting their earbuds to ambient mode and going on with their lives. With the Sony Link Buds, that seems to be the main focus.

more…

The post Sony unveils the open style Link Buds with Google Assistant, Fast Pair, and skin touch controls appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sony unveils a newly designed pair of truly wireless earbuds with no ANC. These are the Sony Link Buds with Google Assistant.
